alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:29AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Holmes County through 415 AM EDT... At 329 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millersburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millersburg, Berlin, Walnut Creek, Sugarcreek, Killbuck, Holmesville, Winesburg, Farmerstown, Mount Hope and Charm. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
